prompt_base: raw photo, (unretouched:1.2) cinematic film still, portrait of a serious young Japanese man, (intense focused gaze:1.1), short messy brown hair, wearing a (weathered brown leather bomber jacket:1.3), simple white t-shirt, urban 1980s street background, 8k uhd
